com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.util.Wrapper<Attribute>
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attribute

    public class StdAttribute
extends Wrapper<Attribute>
implements Attribute
    Immutable implementation of the Attribute interface.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdAttribute(Attribute attribute)
      Creates an immutable StdAttribute that wraps the given Attribute.
      StdAttribute(Identifier categoryIdIn, Identifier attributeIdIn, AttributeValue<?> valueIn)
      Creates an immutable StdAttribute with the given Identifiers representing the XACML Category and AttributeId, and the AttributeValues representing a single XACML AttributeValue element.
      StdAttribute(Identifier categoryIdIn, Identifier attributeIdIn, AttributeValue<?> valueIn, java.lang.String issuerIn, boolean includeInResultsIn)
      Creates an immutable StdAttribute with the given Identifiers representing the XACML Category and AttributeId, the AttributeValues representing a single XACML AttributeValue element, the given String Issuer, and the given boolean indicating whether the new StdAttribute should be returned as part of a decision Result.
      StdAttribute(Identifier categoryIdIn, Identifier attributeIdIn, java.util.Collection<AttributeValue<?>> valuesIn, java.lang.String issuerIn, boolean includeInResultsIn)
      Creates an immutable StdAttribute with the given Identifiers representing the XACML Category and AttributeId, a copy of the given Collection of AttributeValues representing the XACML AttributeValue elements, the given String Issuer, and the given boolean indicating whether the new StdAttribute should be returned as part of a decision Result.

      • StdAttribute

        public StdAttribute(Identifier categoryIdIn,
            Identifier attributeIdIn,
            java.util.Collection<AttributeValue<?>> valuesIn,
            java.lang.String issuerIn,
            boolean includeInResultsIn)
        Creates an immutable StdAttribute with the given Identifiers representing the XACML Category and AttributeId, a copy of the given Collection of AttributeValues representing the XACML AttributeValue elements, the given String Issuer, and the given boolean indicating whether the new StdAttribute should be returned as part of a decision Result.
        Parameters:
        categoryIdIn - the Identifier representing the XACML Category
        attributeIdIn - the Identifier representing the XACML AttributeId
        valuesIn - the Collection of AttributeValues
        issuerIn - the String Issuer
        includeInResultsIn - the boolean IncludeInResults

      • StdAttribute

        public StdAttribute(Identifier categoryIdIn,
            Identifier attributeIdIn,
            AttributeValue<?> valueIn,
            java.lang.String issuerIn,
            boolean includeInResultsIn)
        Creates an immutable StdAttribute with the given Identifiers representing the XACML Category and AttributeId, the AttributeValues representing a single XACML AttributeValue element, the given String Issuer, and the given boolean indicating whether the new StdAttribute should be returned as part of a decision Result.
        Parameters:
        categoryIdIn - the Identifier representing the XACML Category
        attributeIdIn - the Identifier representing the XACML AttributeId
        valueIn - the AttributeValue
        issuerIn - the String Issuer
        includeInResultsIn - the boolean IncludeInResults

      • getValues

        public java.util.Collection<AttributeValue<?>> getValues()
        Description copied from interface: Attribute
        Gets the Collection of AttributeValue objects for this Attribute. If there are no AttributeValues in this Attribute, an empty Collection must be returned. The returned Collection should not be modified. Implementations are free to return an immutable view to enforce this.
        Specified by:
        getValues in interface Attribute
        Returns:
        a Collection of the AttributeValues for this Attribute

      • findValues

        public <T> java.util.Iterator<AttributeValue<T>> findValues(DataType<T> dataType)
        Description copied from interface: Attribute
        Finds all of the AttributeValue objects with the given DataType in the AttributeValues for this Attribute. If there are no matching AttributeValues, an empty Iterator must be returned.
        Specified by:
        findValues in interface Attribute
        Parameters:
        dataType - the DataType to filter on
        Returns:
        an Iterator over all of the AttributeValues of the given DataType.

      • getIssuer

        public java.lang.String getIssuer()
        Description copied from interface: Attribute
        Gets the String issuer of this Attribute. If the Attribute does not have an issuer, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getIssuer in interface Attribute
        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: Attribute

        Specified by:
        getIncludeInResults in interface Attribute
        Returns:
